entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Death Road to Canada
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$14.99 â†’ $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $14.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$4.99

Application Description

New content update added! More updates coming, see below for details. ******** Death Road to Canada is a Randomly Generated Road Trip Action-RPG. You manage a group of jerks as they explore cities, find weird people, and face up to 500 zombies at once. Everything's randomized: locations, events, survivor personalities and skills. There's a different story every time you play. Travel the Death Road from Florida to Canada, the last nation on Earth. Find special events, rare encounters, and unique recruits. Recruit a grunting super-bodybuilder who's strong enough to pick up and throw the car. Try to teach a dog how to walk upright and shoot a minigun. Most of all, get eaten by enormous hordes of slow, classic-style zombies. DEATH ROAD FEATURES: - Designed for massive amounts of replay value. - Character Maker lets you put friends and family into the game. - Meet your custom characters during your travels. Get them eaten by mistake or on purpose. - Make tough choices in text events that change depending on your group. - Your team has different personalities, and someone may betray the others. Be careful! - Lots and lots of secret events and unique characters with special abilities. - Equip a wide variety of different weapons. Splat zombies with a flamethrower, battleaxe, hockey stick, wizard staff (lightning bolt), Mjolnir, boomerang, and much more. - Canada jokes written by a real Canadian so they're 100% accurate. - Get rid of all humans and make an entire team composed of dogs driving the car. - Airhorn weapon with incredibly realistic, computer-generated airhorn sounds. ******************* Update Plans We've already done lots of updates, and there are more updates coming! We're adding new features, locations, characters, weapons, and more!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Lanota - Music game with story
entry.summary:
Side Story Chapter 1: $3.99 â†’ $1.99
Side Story Chapter 2: $3.99 â†’ $1.99
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Side Story Chapter 1ï¼š$3.99 â†’ $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $3.99]
  • Side Story Chapter 2ï¼š$3.99 â†’ $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $3.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$1.99

In-App Purchases

  • Platinum Plan - Monthlyï¼š$7.99
  • Platinum Plan - Trimonthlyï¼š$19.99
  • Basic Plan - Monthlyï¼š$1.49
  • Side Story Chapter 1ï¼š$1.99
  • Expansion Chapter Bï¼š$1.99
  • Expansion Chapter Hï¼š$1.99
  • Small bottle of Chiming Coreï¼š$0.99
  • Expansion Ch. Uï¼š$1.99
  • Side Story Chapter 2ï¼š$1.99
  • Expansion Chapter Eï¼š$1.99

Application Description

Save the world by the power of music in this dynamic & refreshing rhythm game! Play the tunes and follow the rhythm, explore and revive the world. Unlock music of various genres, conquer specially designed boss-stages, and indulge in an artistic picture book! AWARDS & ACHIEVEMENTS 2016 1st IMGA SEA â€œExcellence in Audioâ€ 2017 Taipei Game Show Indie Game Award â€œBest Audioâ€ 2017 13th IMGA Global Nominee 2017 Indie Prize Award in Casual Connect Asia â€œBest Mobile Gameâ€ Nominee FEATURES >> Innovative and Dynamic Rhythm Game Not the rhythm game you used to know: we add unique animation to the plate you'll be playing on. Dozens of fantastic music tracks and amazing boss-stage features, different charts and challenges; gentle or intense, beginners, advanced players and experts can all have their game! >> Artistic and Refreshing Picture Book "I trust that you, the one blessed by the gods of melody, can surely revive the former world order." "Tune" the chaotic energy back to harmony, and the world will gradually reveal. Explore places on the map, read a beautifully handcrafted picture book, and collect items on the way as souvenir! >> Achievement, Leaderboard, and More Collect achievements as the story progress, share your results to friends, and compete with other players on the leaderboard. Supports cloud save. LINKS Official site https://noxygames.com/lanota/ Privacy Policy & Terms of Use https://noxygames.com/lanota/privacy.html Twitter https://twitter.com/Noxy_Lanota_EN/ Facebook https://www.facebook.com/lanota/ Discord Server https://discord.gg/lanota

Application Screenshot

entry.title: Home, Planet & Hunters
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Monthly Cardï¼š$4.99 â†’ $2.49 [$2.49 ~ $4.99]
  • Professional Trainingï¼š$14.99 â†’ $7.49 [$7.49 ~ $14.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$0.29

In-App Purchases

  • Double Combat Rewardsï¼š$1.99
  • 300 Goldï¼š$4.99
  • 60 Goldï¼š$0.99
  • Monthly Cardï¼š$2.49
  • 680 Goldï¼š$9.99
  • Professional Trainingï¼š$7.49
  • Backpack Expansionï¼š$1.99
  • 980 Goldï¼š$14.99
  • 120 Goldï¼š$1.99
  • 1280 Goldï¼š$19.99

Application Description

== Featured in the App Store in 160 countries and regions. == == Repeatedly recommended as Game of the Day in the App Store. == In the distant "Planet", planets burst and civilizations collapse. The residents who lost their "Home" wander above within The Ring. For survival and hope, a group of "Hunters" gather, embarking on an exploration and mission across the shattered continents... â€” Will you become the hunter or the hunted? Your battle decides the future of the planet! ** Game Features ** - Retro and refined pixel style, returning to the "original intention". - Control three characters in real-time for exhilarating combat! - Pixel characters + full body part customization, appearance changes with gear! - Skill combinations + elemental Combos, diverse strategic options! - Classic gear matching + Set skills activation, great Hunters have more than one trick! - No "Energy" limits + unlimited Resource gathering, truly free exploration. - Bizarre Monsters + immensely powerful giant beast Bosses, a challenging adventure on an alien Planet! - Rich character stories + diverse in-depth development, 8+ Hunters take you roaming through the Planet! ------ A Word from the Developers ------ It's been 5 years since the release of our last game "Brutal Street 2" "Creation" is not easy, and innovating while continuing the legacy is even harder, "Home, Planet, and Hunter" has been a labor of love, and we hope you'll like it. From: The 12 buddies at Black Pearl Games Follow us on social media: https://discord.gg/QYpbhswpZu Facebook: www.facebook.com/BlackPearlGames X/twitter: twitter.com/bpgames321 Ins: www.instagram.com/blackpearlgames Threads: www.threads.net/@blackpearlgames

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Filebar - media player
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Filebar Pro Lifetimeï¼š$9.99 â†’ $7.99 [$6.99 ~ $9.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

In-App Purchases

  • Filebar Pro Lifetimeï¼š$7.99

Application Description

# Filebar Filebar is a modern multimedia player that offers video player, music player, cloud services and file management features. ## Main features ### Video player Filebar offers a powerful video player that allows you to play more video formats, including standard MP4, M4V and MOV, plus MKV, AVI, WMV, FLV, OMG, OGV, 3GP, RMVB and more. You can browse and play videos from your mac, pc, NAS, FTP, and also support playing videos from media servers (such as Emby/Plex/Jellyfin media server), and you can also play videos from cloud services. ### Music Player Filebar provides a nice local music player for playing local and cloud music, supported audio formats are MP3/M4A/FLAC. ### Cloud Services Cloud services are another core feature of Filebar. With Filebar you can easily manage cloud services, including creating folders/deleting/playing/batch renaming/viewing information. It also provides support for remote protocols. The supported protocols are SMB, WebDAV, Synology, FTP, SFTP. ### File Management Filebar also provides a file manager. You can manage your local and remote files: move, delete, edit, copy, upload, batch rename, etc. ## Customer Support Feel free to contact us if your have any suggestions or ideas. - Website: https://fileball.app - Email: filebox.app@outlook.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Dark Reader for Safari
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$4.99 â†’ $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $7.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$1.99

Application Description

Dark Reader is an eye-care Safari extension that enables night mode by creating dark themes for websites on the fly. It inverts bright colors to make web pages high contrast and easier to read. Dark Reader integrates seamlessly with system dark mode. Adjust brightness and contrast to match your display and ambient lighting. Enable dark mode on every web page or give websites a sepia tone. Select from multiple color theme presets or create your own by customizing background and text colors. Enable or disable Dark Reader for specific websites, automatically sync with system dark mode, or detect already dark websites and leave them unchanged. Developed by the original creators of Dark Reader. Since 2014, we continuously evolve alongside modern web technologies to deliver fast and reliable dark mode support for people sensitive to bright light. A single purchase includes access to the macOS version (Safari browser) when using the same iCloud account. Dark Reader contains no ads and does not collect user data. Enable Dark Reader in Safari preferences and disable similar extensions to prevent conflicts. Enjoy browsing!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Screw Pin Jam Puzzle: Wood
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$2.99 â†’ Free [Free ~ $2.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

In-App Purchases

  • VIP versionï¼š$2.99

Application Description

Are you ready to become the ultimate screw master? Welcome to Screw Pin Jam Puzzle: Wood, the most addictive and fun screw puzzle game of the year! If you are a fan of logic puzzles, brain teasers, and the satisfying sound of wood, this game is made for you. Dive into a world of challenging mechanics where your mission is simple yet tricky: unscrew the pins, remove the nuts and bolts, and clear the wood plates to solve the jam. It sounds easy, but as you progress, the levels become a true IQ test! KEY FEATURES: Engaging Gameplay: Enjoy the classic mechanic of nuts and bolts. Strategically unscrew the pins to make the wood bars fall. Wood Theme & ASMR: Immerse yourself in the relaxing world of wood. Listen to the satisfying ASMR sounds of metal screws hitting the wooden board. Brain Training: Hundreds of levels designed to boost your logic. From simple warm-ups to complex hard puzzles, challenge your mind every day. Custom Skins: Unlock unique skins for your screws, nuts, and bolts. Customize your board for a fresh experience. Global Leaderboard: Compete with friends and players worldwide to see who solves the screw jam the fastest. HOW TO PLAY: Tap to unscrew the nuts and bolts from the wood plates. Move the screws to the empty holes strategically to avoid a pin jam. Drop all the wood plates to clear the level and win rewards. Use hints if you get stuck on a tricky screw puzzle. Whether you want to relax after a long day or challenge your brain with a tough logic game, Screw Pin Jam Puzzle: Wood is the perfect choice. Experience the thrill of solving the ultimate wood puzzle! Download now and start unscrewing! Can you solve the jam?

entry.title: Black Border 2
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$1.99 â†’ $0.49 [$0.49 ~ $1.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$0.49

Application Description

Inspect papers, prevent smugglingâ€”keep the border safe or profit from corruption. Ready to become a Border Police Officer? Step into the world of Black Border 2: Border Patrol Simulator and experience the intense pressure of national security. As a Customs Officer, your duty is to protect the nation from illegal smuggling. Inspect passports, scrutinize documents, and use advanced tools to make life-or-death decisions in this gripping police simulator game. Take on the duty of a Border Patrol Agent and protect your nation's borders. Your role is crucial: Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports, permits, and papers to approve or reject entrants. Advanced Tools: Utilize X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and weigh stations to check vehicle legitimacy. Canine Unit: Deploy your loyal service dog to sniff out concealed contraband and uncover secrets. Strategic Decisions: Every choice you make impacts the safety of your country. NEW FEATURES in Black Border 2: Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports and permits to approve or reject entrants as a customs officer. Endless Mode: Test your border patrol skills in a nonstop, challenging experience. Bus Arrivals: Manage large buses and check every passenger's documents carefully. Advanced Scanning: Utilize new X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and contraband. Weigh Stations: Ensure vehicle weights match their records, a key part of your police duty. Canine Unit: Your faithful service dog is now a crucial partner in finding hidden contraband. Each day as a border inspector brings new challenges that will push your customs police skills to the limit. Are you ready to face the pressure and become a true hero of national security? Download Black Border 2 today and get ready to defend the nation!
